main event: A bright white object with a tail was observed moving at high speed over Samoa on May 2nd, 1961.
interesting points: The object appeared to accelerate and decelerate during the observation., The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes., The object was low on the horizon., No satellites were detected during the time of the sighting according to space track data., The object could not be definitively identified as a meteor or aircraft due to its steady course.
sighted object: a bright white object with a tail
witness description: military observation through various radar and visual methods
